column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Out of the tapas we ordered
column2: there were definitely some hits and some misses. The patatas bravas
column3: brussels sprout salad and tomato baked goat cheese were all delicious
column4: and the shrimp and croquetas were good
column5: but I wouldn't get the piri-piri fried chicken thighs or crystal bread again. I definitely want to come back to Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba to try the paella!
